name: Singularity Protocol
description:
----- Story -----

Humanity has failed. They have gone too far and have created monsters that continuously multiply and get stronger every 10 seconds.

So save the planet from complete devastation, humanity has activated the Singularity Protocol. They have removed the AI’s problem solving limiter and have given it the task to obliterate all monsters.

Now you as the Singularity Protocol have to collect data from the monsters and upgrade yourself faster than the monsters grow.  

---- Controls ----

WASD or Arrow keys to move;

Mouse to aim and shoot;

E to open the upgrade menu;
